consentModal.title: üç™ Want some cookies?
consentModal.description:
This website uses cookies to enhance your experience and analyze our traffic. Cookies are small text files stored on your device that help us remember your preferences, improve site functionality, and provide you with personalized content.

<button type="button" class="ga-cb !text-stone-300 !underline !mt-2 hover:!text-stone-100 !transition-all" data-cc="show-preferencesModal">Manage preferences</button>

sections.title: Cookie Usage
sections.description: This website uses cookies to ensure basic functionality and to improve your online experience. You can accept or reject statistical cookies at any time. For more details on cookies and other sensitive data, see the full privacy statement.

sections.title: Essential Cookies Always Enabled
sections.description: Essential for core website functions like security, navigation, and accessing secure areas. Without these, the site won't work properly.

sections.title: Functional Cookies
sections.description: These cookies remember your preferences (like language) and enhance the website's functionality, making your experience more personalized and convenient.

sections.title: Analytical Cookies
sections.description: Used to collect anonymous data on how visitors use the site. This helps improve performance and user experience by tracking trends and issues.

sections.title: Marketing Cookies
sections.description: These cookies track your online activity to display relevant ads and measure the effectiveness of marketing campaigns. They help ensure ads are tailored to your interests.

services.title: Web Development
services.description: With me you get design and programming from a single source, and I accompany you in all phases of your project.

services.title: Business Websites
services.description: I create an attractive website for your company using modern technologies such as NodeJS and React.

services.title: Ecommerce
services.description: With Wordpress and WooCommerce I can offer you high-quality online shops with tailored design solutions and ease of use.

services.title: Technical SEO
services.description: Having a fast and secure website and using modern web standards is very important these days. I can optimize your source code and server settings.

services.title: Security
services.description: Every website should be protected from attacks. If you want to have your website professionally secured, I am exactly the right person for you.

services.title: Support
services.description: Do you already have a website, but you sometimes have a question or two? I will be happy to help you with your request.

testimonials.name: Mark H.
testimonials.text: Working with Sven was a breeze! He understood our vision perfectly and delivered a website that exceeded our expectations. Fast, responsive, and creative!

testimonials.name: Sarah L.
testimonials.text: Sven turned our ideas into a stunning, functional website. The attention to detail and responsiveness to feedback were top-notch.

testimonials.name: Tom W.
testimonials.text: From start to finish, Sven was professional, communicative, and delivered on time. The custom features he implemented took our online presence to the next level.

testimonials.name: Jessica M.
testimonials.text: Sven's work on our project was nothing short of outstanding. He was quick to address changes and always offered valuable insights. The final product blew us away!

testimonials.name: David S.
testimonials.text: I was amazed by how smooth the entire process was. Sven made sure every detail was perfect, and the end result was a sleek, user-friendly website.

testimonials.name: Emma R.
testimonials.text: Professional, creative, and dedicated. Sven transformed our outdated website into a modern platform that truly represents our brand.

testimonials.name: Carlos R.
testimonials.text: Sven is a CODE MACHINE!! I don't think there's anything he doesn't know. A great trainer, you can learn a LOT and he gives great feedback.

testimonials.name: Priya M.
testimonials.text: Absolutely brilliant! Sven breaks down complex concepts into easy-to-understand bits. I left every session feeling more confident with JavaScript.

testimonials.name: Emily L.
testimonials.text: Sven's knowledge is mind-blowing, and he's incredibly patient with questions. I finally understand closures thanks to his clear explanations.

testimonials.name: Maya S.
testimonials.text: You won't find a more dedicated instructor. Sven genuinely cares about your progress and gives constructive feedback that pushes you to improve.

testimonials.name: Daniel K.
testimonials.text: If you think JavaScript is confusing, take Sven's course. He turns what seems complicated into something you actually get.

testimonials.name: Charlie B.
testimonials.text: Highly engaging and super informative. Sven keeps you on your toes with real-world challenges and solutions that stick.
